it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.match

Class SpawnController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.match.SpawnController

  • public class SpawnController
extends Object
    Provides static methods to handle initial spawn and respawn after death.
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpawnController(Match match)
      Creates a new spawn controller for given match

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initialSpawn(PersistentView view)
      Handles the initial spawn of the player.
      void respawn(PersistentView view)
      Handles the respawn of a player when he is dead.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpawnController

        public SpawnController(Match match)
        Creates a new spawn controller for given match
        Parameters:
        match - The match to be controlled, not null

    • Method Detail

      • initialSpawn

        public void initialSpawn(PersistentView view)
                  throws InterruptedException
        Handles the initial spawn of the player. Doesn't check that the player needs to spawn If the player doesn't respond in time, no spawn location is chosen and the player won't spawn at all.
        Parameters:
        view - the view of the player who has to spawn
        Throws:
        CancellationException - if the request to the player gets cancelled
        InterruptedException - if the thread gets interrupted

      • respawn

        public void respawn(PersistentView view)
             throws InterruptedException
        Handles the respawn of a player when he is dead. Doesn't check that the player is dead If the player doesn't respond or if hes's suspended, the user is automatically spawned on the location corresponding to the card he drew. This function also guarantees that the drawn card will be the first in the request
        Parameters:
        view - the view of the player who needs to be respawned
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the thread gets interrupted
